chapters.title: Chapter 3:  A Dangerous Place
chapters.info: Coteren, p. 116—Bulky, beady-eyed Asha'man, and one of Taim's cronies in the Black Tower. He is bulky, with black, oily hair that he wears long and loose. He has a blunt face, pudgy cheeks, and focused, dangerous eyes. He is the one who informs Androl, whom he refers to as “pageboy” in reference to his Talent for Traveling, of his demotion back to Soldier.
